channel.title: Client help
channel.description:
I can get any client to run my server is that correct? Well not ANY but one thats compatable with my server?
Also can I portforward from a laptop thats using wifi from a different computer in my house. And when I go to portforward I have Verizon and it seems I have limited access when portforwarding. And I can't put both on the Protocol how should I go about with this?
Thank you.
